name: Paper Mario Origami King | Puzzle Sandbox
name_original: Paper Mario Origami King | Puzzle Sandbox
description:
Practice puzzles from Paper Mario Origami King with this tool! Use the import/export tool to easily send your board to a friend, or have them send you the one they're struggling on.

When you press the Export button, it copies the current Board's code into the text field on the bottom right, which you can click and copy to your clipboard. This code consists of 48 characters, so it'll be easy to send to a friend or save for later.

Controls are written in-game, but broken down in more detail below:

  • Left Clicking a Tile - Toggles the enemy forward 1 color (clear, red, green, blue, yellow)
  • Right Clicking a Tile - Removes enemy from the tile
  • Spacebar - Toggle between Move mode and Select mode; equivalent to the "A" button in the real game
  • Arrow Keys - In Select Mode, change which part of the board you're highlighting. In Move Mode, move the currently selected part of the board around.
  • Left Shift - Toggle between "Slide" and "Rotate" styles of board control
  • X - Undo/Cancel
